attributes.action: Mandatory Drug Testing for all government ministers
attributes.additional_details: Agree to allow the police to carry out Random drug tests on all government ministers.
attributes.background: Government ministers hold positions of immense responsibility and power. Decisions made in our government have far-reaching effects on the lives of millions of people. Testing for drug use among ministers can help ensure that they are making decisions in a clear, sober frame of mind.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Introduce random alcohol & drug testing within the House of Commons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714495
